Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that ABC 7 reported the Santa Clarita high school shooting "3 weeks in advance" when there is no evidence to support this.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence found to confirm that ABC 7 reported the shooting three weeks before it happened.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that ABC 7 reported the shooting in advance, without any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim could have an alternative explanation, such as being part of a "false flag" theory fueled through social media that seeks to promote the idea that the shooting never happened.
